DescriptionData.Title: AJs Girls Thigh High Ragdoll Socks
DescriptionData.Description: Our thigh high ragdoll socks in child size for younger performers. The 26 inch long socks in stripes are exactly like the adult version except scaled down for kids! Made from 86% acrylic, 8% nylon and 6% elastic and fits socks size 6 - 9 (approx. 8-12 yrs).
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Made from 86% acrylic, 8% nylon and 6% elastic
Long tube socks fit sock size 6-9 (approx 8-12 yrs)
